endpoints.description: Retrieve the current status of all monitored telecommunication networks.
Create a new alert configuration for real-time monitoring.
Access analytics reporting on network data usage.
List all recorded network faults and their details.
Initiate training of predictive maintenance models on network data.
Check the connectivity status for specific devices within the network.
Update network settings to improve service quality.
Retrieve the scheduled maintenance times for networks.
Submit and record user feedback on network performance.
Remove a specific alert configuration by ID.
